summary: Pietro is a young bourgeois lawyer who married Giuliana, a pretty girl who was a little unscrewed, and met at a party of artists. Despite the premises, everything between the two seems to work best.
cast: Monica Vitti|Giorgio Albertazzi|Maria Grazia Buccella|Rossella Como|Michel Bardinet|Italia Marchesini|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Anna Saia|Paola Cortini|Bruno Alias|Luis La Torre
title: Ti ho sposato per allegria
